titleStmt.title: The anti-covenant, or a sad complaint concerning the new Oath or Covenant: presented in a letter to a dear and intimate friend, with earnest request for his advice and prayers. By a true loyall subject, and lover of the Parliament.
titleStmt.author: True loyall subject and lover of the Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lychfield, printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false; actually printed in London (Madan).
A reply to "A sacred vow and covenant taken by the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament" promulgated by Parliament on 6 June 1643.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
